item.title: Rishi Sunak becomes first Indian-origin Prime Minister of UK
item.description: Rishi Sunak becomes first Indian-origin Prime Minister of UK Britain's Conservative Party leader Rishi Sunak becomes the first Indian-origin and Hindu Prime Minister of the United Kingdom.

item.title: Supreme Court sets aside high court order granting bail to accused arrested with morphine
item.description: Supreme Court sets aside high court order granting bail to accused arrested with morphine The Supreme Court has set aside a Gauhati High Court order which granted bail to two men, accused of possessing about 13 kg of morphine in a motor vehicle.

item.title: 'It has power to bring light to world': Joe Biden lights a diya, hosts largest-ever Diwali reception at White House
item.description: ‘It has power to bring light to world’: Joe Biden lights a diya, hosts largest-ever Diwali reception at White House US President Joe Biden hosted a Diwali reception at the White House which was attended by more than 200 eminent Indian Americans.

item.title: Bidens host largest ever Deepavali reception at White House
item.description: Bidens host largest ever Deepavali reception at White House More than 200 eminent Indian Americans attended the reception at the East Room of the White House, which saw cultural events including performances by sitarist Rishab Sharma and dance troupe The Sa Dance Company

item.description: Rishi Sunak, first Indian-origin UK PM: 10 things to know about him UK PM Race: Rishi Sunak on Monday is all set to make history on Diwali as Britain’s first Indian-origin Prime Minister after being elected unopposed as the new leader of the governing Conservative Party, following Penny Mordaunt's withdrawal from the race.
